Opt-Medium,5.13: 哎呀，枪走火了！[警长自杀].

Opt-Medium,6.0: MAYBE I cursed the person next to me and killed myself. Oops.
Opt-Medium,6.13: 啊哦，我好像把自己咒死了耶。[术士死于自杀].

Opt-Medium,7.0: I tried to steal the gun from their pocket, but they were just happy to see me.
Opt-Medium,7.13: 我试图从他们口袋里偷枪，却把自己害死了。[窃贼自杀].

Opt-Medium,8.0: I wanted to get out of this toxic relationship anyways.
Opt-Medium,8.13: 无论如何，我都想摆脱这种有毒的关系。[带着恋人死去].

Opt-Medium,9.0: The love of my life died, thus with a kiss I die.
Opt-Medium,9.13: 在天愿作比翼鸟,在地愿为连理枝，所爱以逝，吾亦寻之。[被恋人带死].

Opt-Medium,10.0: My client killed me. Do I still get paid?
Opt-Medium,10.13: 我的客户杀了我。我还能得到报酬吗？[律师被客户杀害].

Opt-Medium,11.0: First they sidekicked me, then they killed me. At least I don't need to do tasks anymore.
Opt-Medium,11.13: 既已纳我为伍，何必取我性命，算了，至少不用做任务了。[跟班被豺狼杀害].

Opt-Medium,12.0: I guess they confused me for the Spy, is there even one?
Opt-Medium,12.13: 他们肯定是把我当成卧底才杀了我，有没有？[内鬼死于队友].

Opt-Medium,13.0: Is my dead body some kind of art now or... aaand it's gone.
Opt-Medium,13.13: 我的尸体现在是某种艺术还是……啊，它不见了。[尸体被清理或吃了].

Opt-Medium,14.0: If my role hasn't been saved, there's no {0} in the game anymore.
Opt-Medium,14.13: 如果我死了,那么场上将不在有{0}了.

Opt-Medium,15.0: I'm not sure, but I guess a {0} color killed me.
Opt-Medium,15.13: 我不确定, 但是我认为是一个有着{0}的人杀了我.

Opt-Medium,16.0: If I counted correctly, I died {0}s before the next meeting started.
Opt-Medium,16.13: 如果我没记错的话, 我在会议前{0}秒就寄了.

Opt-Medium,17.0: It seems like my killer is the {0}.
Opt-Medium,17.13: 我想那杀我的凶手职业应该是{0}.
